name: illuvia
description: ILLUVIA stands as a public blockchain designed exclusively for gaming enthusiasts. With the backing of esteemed game industry leaders, ILLUVIA aims to redefine the concept of "Blockchain for Gaming." At its core, ILLUVIA operates as an EVM-Compatible protocol and embraces the innovative ILLUVIA Architecture. This distinctive architectural framework encompasses a multi-tiered structure, comprising the Central-Layer, a remarkably scalable Layer 1, and the Unity-Layer, a specialized Layer 2 leveraging Ethereum's Layer 2 scaling solution.
